page.title: 12Kevin Smith at home
page.content: Kevin lives near Rowlands Farm in Rowlands Lane.At the moment there are only five houses in the area;there's nobody else for miles.Kevin goes to Ryde High School and is in the fifth year. He has a rather unusual hobby of fox hunting,he also enjoys Table Tennis and bicycle riding. He is not very keen on discos and hardly ever goes out in the evening because he lives so far away from the town.He rarely goes to the mainland. He enjoys living where he does because it is peaceful and quiet. Some of Kevin's friends say that they have seen the Black Puma which is supposed to be living wild on the island. Kevin thinks that if you don't grow up in the countryside you won't really like it.
